fields.deploytemplate:
deploy:
    dtb:
      url: $dtb_url
    kernel:
      url: $image_url
    nfsrootfs:
      url: http://people.linaro.org/~naresh.kamboju/libhugetlbfs-rootfs/latest/arm64/rootfs.tar.xz
      compression: xz
    os: oe
    timeout:
      minutes: 5
    to: tftp
fields.boottemplate:
boot:
    auto_login:
      login_prompt: 'buildroot login:'
      username: root
    commands: nfs
    method: u-boot
    prompts:
      - 'root@buildroot:~# '
    timeout:
      minutes: 5
    type: bootz
